Sentencas: From the view point of compatibility of both crystalline and element with the prototypical perovskite-type electrolyte of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta, a series of micro-Mg-doped La2NiO4+delta compounds with compositions of La2Ni1-xMgxO4+delta (x = 0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) were successfully synthesized via a traditional sol-gel process and evaluated as cathode for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of Mg-doping on crystal structures, bond properties and covalent states were analyzed by X-Ray Diffraction (XRD), Infrared spectra (IR) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) techniques, respectively.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that Mg-doping is benefit for the migration of the interstitial oxygen by weakening the Ni(Mg)-O bond.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: More importantly, we found that Mg doped at the subsurface under the Ni of (001) surface will promote both the 02 adsorption and decomposition process from the analysis of the oxygen migration dynamics.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Considering the balance of electronic conductivity, it was indicated that La2Ni0.98Mg0.2O4+delta (LNM0.02) manifested the optimal electrochemical property with the lowest area specific resistance of 0.05 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C, and along with a maximum power density of 528 mW cm(-2) for an electrolyte supported single cell LNM0.02 vertical bar LSGM vertical bar NiO-SDC at 800 degrees C with approximately 20% higher than that of the La2NiO4+delta (LN) (similar to 429 mW cm 2) cathode.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that introducing micro-dose of Mg into Ni-site in La2NiO4+delta compound is an efficient way to obtain an excellent cathode material for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical property by Mg-doping La2Ni1-xMgxO4+δ=0.0, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.10) cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
